name: codeagentswarm
description: Claude Code Terminal Manager - Multiple terminal quadrants for Claude Code

scripts.set-build-time: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const pkg=require('./package.json'); const now=new Date(); const timestamp=now.getFullYear()+'.'+(now.getMonth()+1).toString().padStart(2,'0')+now.getDate().toString().padStart(2,'0')+'.'+(now.getHours().toString().padStart(2,'0')+now.getMinutes().toString().padStart(2,'0')); pkg.version=timestamp; fs.writeFileSync('./package.json', JSON.stringify(pkg, null, 2));"
